definition: a flat piece of material designed for a special purpose, to provide food and lodging for
details:
noun
- a flat piece of material designed for a special purpose
= example: a flat piece of material designed for a special purpose
- a flat portable surface, usually rectangular, designed for board games
= example: a flat portable surface, usually rectangular, designed for board games
= synonyms: gameboard
- a printed circuit that can be inserted into expansion slots in a computer to increase the computer's capabilities
= synonyms: card, circuit board, circuit card, plug-in, add-in
- electrical device consisting of a flat insulated surface that contains switches and dials and meters for controlling other electrical devices
= synonyms: control panel, instrument panel, control board, panel
- a table at which meals are served
= synonyms: dining table
- a vertical surface on which information can be displayed to public view
= synonyms: display panel, display board
- food or meals in general
= synonyms: table
- a committee having supervisory powers
= example: a committee having supervisory powers
- a stout length of sawn timber
= synonyms: plank
verb
- to provide food and lodging for
= example: to provide food and lodging for
- to lodge and take meals at
= example: to lodge and take meals at
- to get on board of trains, buses, ships, aircraft, etc.
= example: to get on board of trains, buses, ships, aircraft, etc.
= synonyms: get on
- to live and take one's meals at or in
= example: to live and take one's meals at or in
= synonyms: room
